MAIN_MESSAGE: The electricity supply to your premises may currently be affected by planned work.  You should have received a letter explaining this.  We hope to be able to restore your supplies by 04-NOV-2020 17:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the PA18 postcode area of Wemyss Bay is still ongoing. This is due to difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:22pm on Wednesday, 04 November 2020
